basics.name: Andrei Matea
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Dedicated and enthusiastic iOS Developer with several years experience in delivering apps from scratch to AppStore release. Worked with many Start-Up project ideeas, but also with leading video and ecommerce industires and IoT clients.

work.summary: Created apps for Start-Up ideeas with different range of specific domains like tracking, mental health, movie industry; but also had the chance to work with leading industires in video streaming and IoT gigants with tens of device types. Each of those projects grew my knowledge and offered me the posibility to grind my professional skills
highlights: Strong UI skills - since working on a couple of projects, each of them had their own unique UI; ofcouse I've been using abstractisations, but I've develop a fast implementing skills and scalable approach

work.summary: During the internship each intern had one or two mentros who guided/helped him throughout the process, mostly with technical informations/tips and tricks; pull requests reviews and monitoring his/her progress
highlights: Constant feedback about the progress of an iOS junior

volunteer.summary: We've organized different types of social and gathering events dedicated to UBB students, especially of Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics

awards.title: Most active volunteer
awards.summary: As a sign of gratitude for the dedication, passion and perseverance shown during the event Freshman Ball
